pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BIMCV COVID 19 interfaceThis repository provides a python interface for working with [BIMCV COVID 19 dataset](https://github.com/BIMCV-CSUSP/BIMCV-COVID-19)Before use, please read the [license agreement](https://github.com/BIMCV-CSUSP/BIMCV-COVID-19) for the use of the BIMCV-COVID19 Dataset.## Installation```bashpip install bimcvcovid19i```## System requirements|Dataset |Original|Prepered|Total||--------------------------------|:------:|:------:|:---:||BIMCV COVID19 positive cIter 12 | 390G| 408G| 797G||BIMCV COVID19 negative cIter 12 | 469G| 480G| 948G||BIMCV COVID19 positive cIter 123| 2.8T| ?T| ?T|
